name: Formtool-2926  (As a Club Employee, I would like to see the BLC order number in the submission record so I can more easily cross-reference data)
Formtool-2936  (As a Fan, I would like to pick or specify the amount I want to pay so that I only pay what I want to pay)
Formtool-2858  As a Fan, I would like to be able to make a purchase on a transactional form
Formtool-2925  As a Fan, I would like to see that I have made a successful purchase
Formtool-2941  As an Editor, I would like to be able to specify if a product on a form is required so that I can make sure a fan buys the product
Formtool-2943  As an Editor, I would like to be prevented from saving a poorly configured product, so that I can catch my mistake early
Formtool-2959 As an Editor, I would like to be able to add a dropdown containing products so that a fan can select to purchase one of those products
Formtool-2961  As a Fan, I would like to be able to select items to purchase from a dropdown
Formtool-2963 As an Editor, I would like to add products to a dropdown of products so that a fan can select to purchase one of those products
Formtool 3010 As a Fan, I would like to be informed if there is an error submitting payment information, so that I can correct any issues
Formtool-3011 As a Fan, I would like immediate notification that I have submitted the payment, so that I know my action was received
Formtool-3007 As a person with access to submission data, I would like Product information to appear in the submission details & export, so that I have some clue what the fan purchased
Formtool-3005 As a Fan, I would like to be informed if I have not properly filled out a Product field, so that I can correct the issues and proceed to purchase
Formtool-3004 As a fan, I would like to know if a product is required so that I fill out the form correctly
